website_summaries.verdict: A light golf shirt that makes a statement for the Fourth of July.
pros: Flag graphics are nice and bold
Good quality construction on this shirt
A nice shirt that comes in several bold patriotic designs
cons: No pocket on the shirt front

customer_reviews.title: EXCEEDED ALL HOPES OR EXPECTATIONS
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT 1 SHIRT, LOVED IT SO MUCH I ORDERED 2 MORE, YOU WILL TOO ! YOU CAN COMMUNICATE WITH THE AMERICAN COMPANY TOO, UNBELIEVABLE ! NO CHEAP JUNK HERE. MONDAY I AM GOING TO BUY 1 OF THE REMAINING SHIRTS---SOLD AMERICANA !!! I AM 9 YEAR VIETNAM VET. THIS WONDERFUL COMPANY ALSO HAS QUALITY FLAG PANTS. DO BUSINESS WITH THIS FAMILY OWNED AMERICAN BUSINESS YOUR REWARD IS QUALITY A BARGAIN,, 100% SATISFACTION--IF I HAD ENOUGH MONEY AVAILABLE TODAY, I WOULD BUY THE REMAINING SHIRTS TODAY ! HOLLY MOLLY IS REAL JOLLY
customer_reviews.author: holly molly

customer_reviews.title: Check sizes before ordering.  Read reviews/comments with discretion!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the design and quality of this shirt. Unfortunately, I read comments and reviews of the shirt on site, and there were many comments that advised that the shirt ran very small, and advised buyers to purchase a size or two larger than they would usually buy. Because of that, I purchased 2 shirts; size XL and size XXL. When the shirts arrived, the XL was too large, and the XXL was HUGE. I had to return both shirts for refund, and now I don't know if I can even order the same shirt in a size Large, which is what I should have ordered to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Judy M.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Cotton is WARM!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is exactly what I wanted for the 4th of July. I knew going in that the shirt was 100% cotton but the shirt was exactly designed with what I wanted on it.....the U.S. Flat and the U.S. Constitution. I wish it had come in a "breathable" fabric but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Olesarge

customer_reviews.title: Very nice comfortable shirt.
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of charity work for our Veterans and I needed something to wear when we are at events and parades. This shows our passion for our country and our service members sacrifices plus looks good and is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fit and great print colors!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful print , colors and written print very nice and wife loved it. It is 100% cotton and haven’t washed it yet but seems well made and stitched well. I have a different similar looking shirt that is polyester and been enjoying ease of care ( easy to wipe food stains and lighter weight Think anyone would be happy to have this shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Bill

customer_reviews.title: Go Big
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking shirt. It is high quality material that holds color after washing and feels soft to the touch. I received several compliments walking around town, especially around the national holidays. It does run small and even when buying a size larger, seems to be shorter than comparable shirts of other brands. It was about right in the shoulders and arms but the length fell just to my waistline, making it a bit too small to tuck in without expecting it to un-tuck when sitting to standing.
customer_reviews.author: TDP

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: First, the shirt looks great, I received many compliments from strangers the first time I wore it. The downside is my shirt does not have any stretch or give to it. Additionally, it is on the heavy side Which you like would be good but in Florida it’s very hot. I still love the design and the look.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE TO SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size XL, but bought a size XXL due to the type of material. The XXL was to small. I gave it to my grandson who wears a medium size. It fit him perfectly. Other then that small fact it was a nice shirt.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: STYLE AND APPEAL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shirt for Independence Day but didn't arrive in time. I finally decided to wear it for the Labor Day holiday weekend. Was initially pleased with its appearance, however, based on the amount of enthusiastic comments I've received while wearing garment, I consider it well, in fact more that worth its purchase price. I would highly recommend this purchase to anyone interested in displaying patriotism or just the vivid sharp color contrasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% Cotton
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shirt - bought for the 4th - he is an XL or XXL - based on reviews I bought the XL and it is perfect! Well Made in India. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chef 4 U

customer_reviews.title: Husband is so happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband -he loves the feel of the fabric and the fit is perfect. The best is the patriotic print theme-he loves ir
customer_reviews.author: Mormick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great feel, light.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shirt. You might want to order one size smaller. We ordered our exact size and the shirts we received were too large (returned). Will reorder one size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: DHRPP

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: The shirt was a gift for my step-grandson's High School graduation. He seems pleased with the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J. Watt

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, good looking shirt, which fit well. We saw it in a store window on recent trip, and was very pleased to find it available on line. I highly recommend the shirt, and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Linny Lou

customer_reviews.title: So many compliments
customer_reviews.text: The shirt has a nice comfortable feel, and after several washings, still looks new. But be prepared for strangers to come up to you and tell you how nice the shirt looks. Happens all the time.
customer_reviews.author: wizank

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and is very pleasant to wear. Other flag shirts I had before were kind of stiff and they felt like the flag print was some plastic foil ironed on to the shirt. This one is very comfortable and light to wear. Even on a hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic feels great a lot of my friends like it get one for yourself soon
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Very well made shirts!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shirts,, bought one for my husband and one for my son and they love them!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Murray

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly. I wore it for the first time on 4th of July and got many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: jose bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall folks
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing I asked about it's length because I'm 6'2" and all replies came back positive. It barely reaches down to my waste.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B.

customer_reviews.title: The white in the shirt is more beige than white.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is great quality and comfortable material but you should know that the color of the shirt is more red, white, and beige. Personally, I didn't care for the beige color and would have returned it if I had time to reorder and get in time for the 4th of July.
customer_reviews.author: FLNative

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful shirt, very reasonably and looks nice on.
customer_reviews.author: Mab

customer_reviews.title: Runs REALLY LARGE
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice quality shirt, but WAY too big. My husband usually wears a xl to 1x, and this shirt looks like a nightgown
customer_reviews.author: Doggy Den

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Worn the shirt several times. It fits well, very comfortable with the cotton - and several compliments about it.
customer_reviews.author: JRC2

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shirt, the photo doesn't show off the detail
customer_reviews.text: I received many compliments on the American Flag/Constitution Polo-shirt. It fit great, and was very comfortable. I was pleasantly surprised and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great material nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be very patriotic especially around the holidays so I definitely want to be wearing my red white and blue
customer_reviews.author: RYAN M. FARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Bought a large and it fits like a medium
customer_reviews.text: I love the shirt. It looks good and can't wait to wear it this 4th of July! However, I wear a large shirt in all my polo's(under armor, Nike etc.) but this shirt was way to small. Could barely get my arms close enough to get the shirt over my head and then pull it down. Just a very tight fit for a large, I guess I am a loose fit person. I am gonna order an extra large as soon as my refund is applied and try that out. Hopefully the sleeves won't be to big then.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Charland

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to golf shirt for the 4th of July, Air Force birthday and any other special day with a patriotic theme. It is a bit thicker than I care for in the SC heat but it wears good and is colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Spirited.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered XL because I have found most Chinese made shirts run small. Not this one. Big for me but I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Busino

customer_reviews.title: It has a large label but fits like a XXlarge
customer_reviews.text: It has a large label but fits like a XXlarge ! Very umcomfortable to me. I ordered the small the second time around to see if that works for me. I will have to try and go thru the return policy and how to get a refund for the large size, Other than that it is a great shirt and high quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: lottodude

customer_reviews.title: Size not right
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an extra large. It was way to large. I returned it and ordered a large. It was too small. The shirt looked great but I could not get a proper fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flag Day
customer_reviews.text: Flag day is coming up and I wanted a good shirt to wear. This shirt allows me to “wear my Heart on my arm” as the saying goes
customer_reviews.author: Jon.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: High quality, thick material, fits well (I'm 6 ft tall, 215lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Doug J

customer_reviews.title: This shirt is so very nice very high quality fits as ordered my friends want ...
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is so very nice very high quality fits as ordered my friends want me to order for them i work for the PGR of America buy this shirt its well worth the money

customer_reviews.title: I bought this shirt for my husband as a Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for my husband as a Christmas gift. He has worn it several times and has received many compliments, some from complete strangers. I think it runs a tad small. My husband loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shirt!! My husband loved it and looks so amazing!!

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, Looks amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This Eagle/Flag shirt sure came right on time, almost in time for Independence Day. It feels really nice, nice graphics of the Bald Eagle and flag. Will surely get a lot of compliments on it!

customer_reviews.title: Need tall sizes.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is 6’2” tall I wish they had tall sizes.

customer_reviews.title: My husband enjoyed wearing it during the week of the 4th of ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband enjoyed wearing it during the week of the 4th of July, however, it didn't come out of the laundry too well. Definitely needs to be ironed.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Shirt is very comfortable as well as attractive. Received many compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Looked great
customer_reviews.text: Looked great was very comfortable sizes ran a little big not much
customer_reviews.author: William S. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Nice shit
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shirt. True to fit, my husband Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wants to know where I got this shirt. Feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopheram

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Just a little small, but not bad. The only thing for me and this is just my preference, there is no pocket. I'm a shirt pocket guy for my pen and cell when I am mobile.
customer_reviews.author: James Kadiddlehopper

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt...very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shirt and the quality was great, nice and soft. Very happy with the design. We did order 1 Size larger as indicated...fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I love the shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love the shirt, it fits as expected, the only reason I don't give a 5 star rating is I feel the price was too high.

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo Many Compliments
customer_reviews.text: My Husband Got Soooo Many Compliments on THIS SHIRT on the 4th Of July!! It Really Is A Very NICE SHIRT!!

customer_reviews.title: Wash separately!
customer_reviews.text: When you wash it for the first time, wash separately, the red from the flag bled badly.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the item but the size was larger than expected
customer_reviews.author: Sonia A. Benel

customer_reviews.title: Buy at least 3 sizes larger
customer_reviews.text: Washed in cold/cold. Dryer on low heat. Shrank like plastic wrap in a fire. Bought a large and it shrank so badly, I couldn't even get it over my head. Complete disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Rocap

customer_reviews.title: Great look.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt looked great and fit fine. The material was just a bit to heavy for a warm day.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fits perfect. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: People love it. Got a lot of compliments while out and at work.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I already had a similar one and got so many compliments I went online and found this.

customer_reviews.title: Better in person and fit my husband who is 5’6”

customer_reviews.title: Wore this shirt and patriotic hat and won the most ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore this shirt and patriotic hat and won the most patriotic at a Forth of July party. Extremely well made and fit as expected.

customer_reviews.title: great flag polo shirt purchased to protest NFL
customer_reviews.text: great flag polo shirt purchased to protest NFL.fit was good , printing was perfect. price was good and anazon delivery is always great

customer_reviews.title: Proud to show my patriotism
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, love the color, love the message, love telling people that I love my country.

customer_reviews.title: Great qualities a little short
customer_reviews.text: Great quality very nice looking shirt kind of short in The length if you are a tall person

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the material is a tad hot for humid air but it looks great

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and proud to be seen in this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Fayette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful patriotic shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I will proudly wear this shirt on various patriotic holidays and times in between. The flag is slightly darker than I expected from the photo, but that's just me nitpicking.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: has a "aged look which is a nice effect but not what I was looking for. great quality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shirt. It fit my husband great and he got several compliments on it. Made very nice.
customer_reviews.author: tutu

customer_reviews.title: ... this shirt is the ad photos make it look like the background color is white
customer_reviews.text: Biggest problem with this shirt is the ad photos make it look like the background color is white, or off-white. In reality, the background is a very beige color, so I returned it. You need a new ad photo showing the correct colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cook

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful graphics with vivid colors
customer_reviews.text: Great looking graphics, with vivid colors and a nice cotton weave. Runs big.

customer_reviews.title: I love this shirt. Well,made.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an XL which is a little loose fitting, but still fits well and is an excellent quality. I'm between a L/XL size..

customer_reviews.title: Loose and comfortable for a hot holiday at the pool.
customer_reviews.text: For a hot holiday at the pool, the loose fitting shirt is comfortable and appropriate.

customer_reviews.title: Upside Down Flag and Eagle
customer_reviews.text: The eagle and flag on the shoulders are upside down. Not the end of the world but it looks silly and not as the photo shows. The shirt fits well and is comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this shirt. I already had one, and when my grandson saw it, he wanted the same so this was for him.

customer_reviews.text: Great shirt - quality fabric & construction. Received several compliments & thumbs-ups from complete strangers!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. Good quality and good fit. Wore it to a Red, White & Blue golf tournament and got several positive comments from other golfers.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shirt. A little big but with my size it looked great.

product_meta.title: Cotton Traders Allover Patriotic Men's Polo Shirt
product_meta.description: These Classic fit Polo with different patriotic features in the background are the better way to show your American Pride or your pride in our armed services. These are short sleeves, natural color, 100% cotton, soft hand feel, rib knit collar and cuffs, side vent styling, classic fit, very comfortable. Perfect for 4th of July, Veterans Day, Memorial Day, Tea Party or other patriotic events.
feature_bullets: COMFORTABLE AND LIGHT: Built to last with 100% cotton and quality stitching yet not stiff and pleasant to wear even on a hot day - Order 1 size up to ensure fit.
BE A HIT WITH YOUR FRIENDS: American Summer beautiful and unique designs are sure to get you compliments from your community.
DISPLAY YOUR PATRIOTISM: Wear this clothing proudly and show support for America by letting this t-shirt do the talking for you.
CELEBRATE AMERICAS HOLIDAYS: Honor the Fourth of July, Memorial Day and Veterans Day by wearing apparel not everyone else will have.
PERFECT GIFT: These clothes make a great gift for a veteran, active military or anyone who wants to display thier love for thier country on the 4th of July or any other day.
